subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: A. P. Indy, the 1992 Horse of the Year and one of the industry’s top stallions, has been retired by Lane’s End Farm in Versailles, Ky.
snippet: A. P. Indy, the 1992 Horse of the Year and one of the industry’s top stallions, has been retired by Lane’s End Farm in Versailles, Ky.
